blocks.title: Secure Your Cold Chain in Southeast Asia
blocks.subtitle: Combat heat and humidity with precision. Eliminate spoilage and guarantee freshness for Thai durian, seafood, and pharma logistics.

blocks.title: Challenges in SE Asia Cold Chain

items.title: High Spoilage Rates
items.desc: Thailand's high ambient temperatures accelerate spoilage. A single cooling failure can ruin tons of export-grade durian or seafood.

items.title: Lack of Traceability
items.desc: Traditional logistics lack granular data. Without proof of continuous cooling, exporters face rejected shipments and revenue loss.

items.title: Temperature Data Fraud
items.desc: Manual logs are easily faked. Automated, tamper-proof digital records are essential for building trust with international buyers.

blocks.caption: Complete visibility from Bangkok to border crossings.

items.title: Live Temperature Monitoring
items.desc: Real-time alerts for temp/humidity spikes. Essential for maintaining the quality of sensitive tropical fruit exports.

items.title: Visual Evidence Chain
items.desc: Synchronized video and GPS data provide undeniable proof of cargo integrity and handling procedures during loading/unloading.

items.title: Door Sensor Integration
items.desc: Detect unauthorized door openings instantly. Prevent 'cold air loss' events and theft during transit.

items.title: Automated Compliance
items.desc: Auto-generate digital temperature logs to meet strict export regulations (e.g., GAP, GMP) without manual paperwork.

items.title: Route Optimization for Cold Chain
items.desc: AI-powered routing minimizes transit time and fuel consumption, reducing refrigeration costs while ensuring on-time delivery to ports and distribution centers.

items.title: Multi-Stop Verification
items.desc: Capture timestamped GPS coordinates and video evidence at each loading/unloading point, creating an unbroken chain of custody for high-value cargo.

items.title: D501 Intelligent AI Hub
items.desc: Quad-core processor with dual 1080P video streams, enabling simultaneous driver behavior monitoring and cargo surveillance.
